short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avoid impulse shopping by getting a reminder of your goals before you check out of online shopping sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever heard of a helpful popup? There's a first time for everything.

Online shopping is awesome, but sometimes it's a little too easy — this is a browser extension to help you buy the things you really want, and skip the things you don't.

Use psychology to help yourself reach your financial goals — choosing to put up a small barrier between yourself and spending can help to spend less, and even reduce buyer's remorse.

We collect NO data on you, all history data for your goals, etc. is stored seamlessly on your local browser.
